Properties

Readonly emitInitialValue

emitInitialValue: boolean

Inherited from SimpleObject3DConfiguration.emitInitialValue

  • Defined in src/lib/schemas.ts:146

If true, the this saved is used to emit the object as soon as the module is created.

If false, the object creation will only be triggered when an incoming messages reach the module.

Readonly heightCount

heightCount: number
  • Defined in src/lib/sphere.module.ts:61

Number of vertical segments. Minimum value is 2, and the default is 6.

Readonly objectId

objectId: string

Inherited from SimpleObject3DConfiguration.objectId

  • Defined in src/lib/schemas.ts:110

id of the object.

When the object is included in a scene, only one object with specific id is allowed: if one is already in the scene it is replaced.

Readonly objectName

objectName: string

Inherited from SimpleObject3DConfiguration.objectName

  • Defined in src/lib/schemas.ts:116

Display name of the object

Readonly radius

radius: number
  • Defined in src/lib/sphere.module.ts:43

Sphere radius, default to 1.

Readonly transform

transform: GlobalTransform

Inherited from SimpleObject3DConfiguration.transform

  • Defined in src/lib/schemas.ts:122

Global transformation applied on the object (translation, rotation & scaling)

Readonly widthCount

widthCount: number
  • Defined in src/lib/sphere.module.ts:52

Number of horizontal segments. Minimum value is 3, and the default is 8.
